TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringEnumerator extends System.Object

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫會擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫會擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

public: property System::String ^ Current { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中目前的項目。

span.span: Gets the current element in the collection.
The current element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立列舉值之後或在後呼叫時，列舉值前進到第一個元素的集合，再讀取的值時必須呼叫; 否則是未定義。After an enumerator is created or after a is called, must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of ; otherwise, is undefined. 如果上次呼叫也會發生例外狀況傳回`false`，表示集合的結尾。 also throws an exception if the last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. 不會移動的列舉值，以及連續呼叫位置傳回相同的物件，直到或呼叫。 does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to return the same object until either or is called. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

exception.span: 列舉值是放在集合的第一個項目之前，或最後一個項目之後。

span.span: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 將列舉值往前推至下集合中的下一個項目。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection.

returns.span: 如果列舉值成功前移至下一個項目，則為 ；如果列舉值超過集合的結尾，則為 。

span.span: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立列舉值之後或在後是呼叫，列舉值位於集合中，以及第一次呼叫的第一個項目之前集合的第一個項目上方移動，列舉值。After an enumerator is created or after a is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to moves the enumerator over the first element of the collection. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`直到呼叫。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false` until is called. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果集合已修改之間並，傳回設定為，項目，即使已經無效列舉值。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CPP/stringenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/CS/stringenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.StringEnumerator2/VB/stringenumerator.vb#1)]

span.span: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 設定列舉值至它的初始位置，這是在集合中第一個項目之前。

span.span: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將列舉值移至集合中，第一個元素之前的開頭。 moves the enumerator to the beginning of the collection, before the first element. 在後，列舉值前進到第一個元素的集合，再讀取的值時必須呼叫。After , must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of .
